type ReadOnlyCollectionBase = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable
.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ReadOnlyCollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供强类型化非泛型只读集合的 基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for a strongly typed non-generic read-only collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例始终是只读的。A instance is always read-only. 有关此类的可修改版本，请参阅。See for a modifiable version of this class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不建议使用 `ReadOnlyCollectionBase` 类进行新的开发。We don't recommend that you use the `ReadOnlyCollectionBase` class for new development. 相反，我们建议使用泛型 类。Instead, we recommend that you use the generic class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 GitHub 上 [不应使用非泛型集合](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) 。For more information, see [Non-generic collections shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) on GitHub. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 类。The following code example implements the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/readonlycollectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/readonlycollectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/readonlycollectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型) 成员 Visual Basic 的公共静态 (是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不会为 (线程安全) 包装提供同步 ，但派生类可以使用属性创建其自己的同步版本 。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

para.span: 提供此基类是为了使实现者更容易创建强类型的只读自定义集合。

span.span: This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a strongly typed read-only custom collection.

para.span: 鼓励实现者扩展此基类，而不是自行创建。

span.span: Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

para.span: 此基类的成员是受保护的，仅供通过派生类使用。

span.span: Members of this base class are protected and are intended to be used through a derived class only.

para.span: 此类通过属性使基础集合可用 ，该属性仅供直接从派生的类使用 。

span.span: This class makes the underlying collection available through the property, which is intended for use only by classes that are derived directly from .

para.span: 派生类必须确保自己的用户不能修改基础集合。

span.span: The derived class must ensure that its own users cannot modify the underlying collection.

summary.span: 返回循环访问 实例的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the instance.
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法是一种 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 类。The following code example implements the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/readonlycollectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/readonlycollectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/readonlycollectionbase.vb#1)]

span.span: This class makes the underlying collection available through the property, which is intended for use only by classes that are derived directly from .

para.span: 派生类必须确保自己的用户不能修改基础集合。

span.span: The derived class must ensure that its own users cannot modify the underlying collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的数组必须是兼容的类型。The specified array must be of a compatible type. 此方法使用 复制元素。This method uses to copy the elements. 此方法是一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示对 对象的访问是否同步（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to a object is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 对象的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the object is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象不同步。A object is not synchronized. 派生类可以使用属性提供类的同步版本 。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the class using the property. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 运算。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to a object.

value.span: 一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类可以使用属性提供自己的类同步版本 。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the class using the property. 同步代码必须对对象的属性执行操作 ，而不是直接对对象执行操作 。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the object, not directly on the object. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改对象的其他线程保持正确的同步 。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 运算。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.
